title: AlarmStorageConvertValueToREAL (Function)
text:
FUNCTION AlarmStorageConvertValueToREAL : REAL
Converts a value read from the alarm storage into a REAL value.

rows.Name: liValue
rows.Comment: The value, that was read from TblAlarm

rows: A TypeClass value representing the type of the value
Indicates, whether NULL is stored in the alarm storage
